LanguageData.SP.CheckInteractionDesc: Displays a message telling you how these pawn's personalities interact.
LanguageData.SP.TradeNegotiatorTooltip: {NEGOTIATOR_nameDef} understands how to deal with representatives of this faction. {NEGOTIATOR_pronoun} receives following bonuses:\n{1}.
LanguageData.SP.SPM2_OneNightStandDesc: Chance to beome a couple, chance for passionate lovin (needs VSIE one night stand ON)
LanguageData.SP.SPM2_ManyHandsMakeLightWorkDesc: Faster work vs safety part 1 (needs VSIE many hands make light work tweak)
LanguageData.SP.SPM2_DiscordDesc: Faster work vs safety part 2 (needs VSIE discord ON)
LanguageData.SP.SPM2_VentingDesc: More effective, but more taxing stress relief (needs VSIE venting ON)
LanguageData.SP.SPM2_LeadersDesc: This only hides faction leader's psychological drive, not disables them
LanguageData.SP.SPM2_FriendlyFireDesc: Lower chance for friendly fire. Not much to add.
LanguageData.SP.SPM2_ObtainingNewCharacterTraitsDesc: Obtaining new character traits, replacing old ones, small chance to change whole personality type
